Blacknightmare::

She said using her kindest tone "Be ready Orchestra... Soon you can 
come in base"

She turned off BlackFortress's defences and Lava's lever started to 
retire, soon the BlackFortress would appear.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Orchestra::
> 
>      Orchestra was eager to see Blacknightmare and the other Preds 
again.
> 
>        "Ready when you are," He said to her through the com, in a 
gentle whispering voice.
